data.title: Shop, Dine & Stay in Downtown Denver
data.meta_description: Union Station boasts an array of Denver’s top restaurants, bars, and shops in addition to The Crawford Hotel and RTD Station. See what we have to offer.
data.text:
Urban Market’s at Union Station

Welcome to The Urban Market at Union Station, where local artisans, food vendors, and creatives come together to showcase their talent and passion. Located in the heart of Denver's vibrant downtown, our market offers a unique shopping experience filled with handmade treasures, delicious bites, and community connections.

Back-to-School Ice Cream Social

The coolest way to dive back into the new school year is with a sprinkle of fun and a scoop of yum!

Urban Market’s at Union Station

Welcome to The Urban Market at Union Station, where local artisans, food vendors, and creatives come together to showcase their talent and passion. Located in the heart of Denver's vibrant downtown, our market offers a unique shopping experience filled with handmade treasures, delicious bites, and community connections.

Yappy Hour on The Plaza!

Join us for YAPPY HOURS at Union Station, hosted by Terminal Bar on the Terminal Bar patio. It's a dedicated time for pup play dates and face licks, happening on select Saturdays. Bring your furry friends and let them socialize while you enjoy drinks and good company. See you soon!

Iberian Nights at Ultreia

Join us as we explore the food and drinks of the Iberian Peninsula countries of Spain and Portugal. The Ultreia team has created three-course menus unique to these regions along with appropriate beverage pairings.
